definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]
hanging participle (error of grammar in English)

sentences.english: In a sentence , participles can also be used as objective complements.
sentences.chinese: 在一个句子中分词也可以作宾补。

sentences.english: The linguistic processing splits the term according to the clitic.
sentences.chinese: 语言处理会根据附著词进行分词。

sentences.english: Past participles (- ed form) for adjectives of passive or completed actions.
sentences.chinese: 过去分词表达完成或被动感觉的形容词。

sentences.english: A fast algorithm for generating Chinese word segmentation digraph was given.
sentences.chinese: 给出了一种汉语分词有向图的快速生成算法。

sentences.english: You've got mixed up by the use of participle and gerund.
sentences.chinese: 你混淆了现在分词和动名词的用法。

sentences.english: In english grammar the gerund have exactly the same form as the present participle.
sentences.chinese: 英语文法中，动名词具有与现在分词完全一样的形式。

sentences.english: The participial constructions are employed much more in Latin than they are in English.
sentences.chinese: 拉丁文较英文有更多使用分词结构的句子。

sentences.english: Word Segmentation ( WS ) is a fundamental task in Chinese Information Processing.
sentences.chinese: 自动分词是中文信息处理的基础课题之一。

sentences.english: I received a letter written in green ink.
sentences.chinese: 由绿色墨水书写的，应该是用以前分词做定语。

sentences.english: Participles have the following basic functions.
sentences.chinese: 基本上分词有以下几个作用。

sentences.english: The topic being discussed is participles.
sentences.chinese: 正被讨论的话题是分词。

sentences.english: Strewbis most commonly used in the past participle formbstrewn.
sentences.chinese: 多见于其过去分词形式。

sentences.english: In english grammar the gerund has exactly the same form as the present participle.
sentences.chinese: 英语语法中，动名词具有与现在分词完全一样的形式。

sentences.english: Change the attributive clause in the following sentences into participial phrase.
sentences.chinese: 把下列句中的定语从句改为分词短语。
分词是从动词中分出来的。

sentences.english: Writing carefully, dangling participles must be avoided.

definition: part of speech (noun, verb, adjective etc)/lexical category
